title: Andrei Aleksandrovich Ovchinnikov
text:
Andrei Aleksandrovich Ovchinnikov (; born 17 November 1986) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Metallurg%20Lipetsk">FC Metallurg Lipetsk</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Metallurg%20Lipetsk">FC Metallurg Lipetsk</a> on 3 November 2005 in a game against <a href="FC%20Avangard%20Kursk">FC Avangard Kursk</a>. Ovchinnikov is an important player for Metallurg.
